title: New: Pines – All You Need
content:
Channeling the sounds of fellow countryman Flume, and those of US duo Odesza, PINES enter the foray with their debut offering ‘All You Need’.

Glitchy, sample driven, and demanding of several repeat listens, ‘All You Need’ sparks immediately into life and find it’s form as the track glitters and shimmers across it’s near three minute duration.

Given the early promise of their first cut, there will no doubt be a lot more to come from PINES in the coming months.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
